description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.7GS83RMzWPMDx3LT]{Crusader}

You gain a +2 divine bonus to saving throws against @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Fear} effects and against @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{Diseases}, including magical and supernatural @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{Diseases}. In addition, whenever you succeed at a saving throw against a disease, you are cured of that disease.
